root: ^Hello Detective. *you hear a low growl from the dog in her arms*
^Where were you on the night of the crime?

who: ^My name is Jacklyn. I live alone... except for my dog!
^Where were you on the night of the crime?
^How long have you had the dog?
where: ^On the night of the crime I was outside gardening. I heard a scream and then glass breaking.
^How long have you had your dog?
dog: ^I have had my dog since the death of my husband. So around 2 years.
^Where were you on the night of the crime?
